EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.FTTx.none.L.N.N.12814.FTTx campaign for US regionals.W2 - Webinar In
EmailTemplate.subject: What’s the right technology choice for your broadband network? Hear what Nokia has to say
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thanks for your interest in fiber-to-the-most-economical-point (FTT$), Nokia’s unique, technology-agnostic broadband strategy. This summary <[[https://pages.nokia.com/rs/937-WRZ-618/images/Fiber_to_the_most_economical_point_-_Questions_to_consider.pdf]]> will help you get familiar with the main aspects you need to consider for any network upgrade strategy.
But to learn more, please listen to our exclusive webinar where you’ll get all the facts about FTT$. In particular, as you plan the evolution of your broadband services, this webinar will help you understand the crucial relationship between:
- The broadband speeds you need to provide customers. - The time it takes to deliver new services. - What you can afford to invest.
Webinar: Deploying fiber to the most economical point <[[https://pages.nokia.com/12080.Deploying.fiber.to.the.most.economic.point.html]]>
Speaker: Keith Russell, Marketing Director FTTx, Fixed Networks, Nokia To take your plans further, contact our sales team for a follow-up discussion about your specific broadband network challenges.
Best regards,
Nokia Sales Team Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
